name: FloatingActionButton
desc: A Material Design floating action button.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: The widget below this widget in the tree.

fields.name: tooltip
fields.desc: Text that describes the action that will occur when the button is pressed.

fields.name: foregroundColor
fields.desc: The default foreground color for icons and text within the button.

fields.name: backgroundColor
fields.desc: The button's background color.

fields.name: focusColor
fields.desc: The color to use for filling the button when the button has input focus.

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: The color to use for filling the button when the button has a pointer hovering over it.

fields.name: splashColor
fields.desc: The splash color for this [FloatingActionButton]'s [InkWell].

fields.name: heroTag
fields.desc: The tag to apply to the button's [Hero] widget.

fields.name: onPressed
fields.desc: The callback that is called when the button is tapped or otherwise activated.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.RawMaterialButton.mouseCursor}

fields.name: elevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place this button relative to its parent.

fields.name: focusElevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place this button relative to its parent when the button has the input focus.

fields.name: hoverElevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place this button relative to its parent when the button is enabled and has a pointer hovering over it.

fields.name: highlightElevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place this button relative to its parent when the user is touching the button.

fields.name: disabledElevation
fields.desc: The z-coordinate at which to place this button when the button is disabled ([onPressed] is null).

fields.name: mini
fields.desc: Controls the size of this button.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: The shape of the button's [Material].

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.Material.clipBehavior}

fields.name: isExtended
fields.desc: True if this is an "extended" floating action button.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: materialTapTargetSize
fields.desc: Configures the minimum size of the tap target.

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: Whether detected gestures should provide acoustic and/or haptic feedback.

fields.name: extendedIconLabelSpacing
fields.desc: The spacing between the icon and the label for an extended [FloatingActionButton].

fields.name: extendedPadding
fields.desc: The padding for an extended [FloatingActionButton]'s content.

fields.name: extendedTextStyle
fields.desc: The text style for an extended [FloatingActionButton]'s label.
